title: mayil vAhanA
sahitya:
mayil vAhanA vaLLi manamOhanA sharavaNabhava varamaruLvAi vA mA


anupallavi

  kayilAyam mudal malaigaLilellAm kaLiththu
 viLaiyADum panniru kaiyA murugaiyA


caraNam    pUrNa candiran pOlum arumukhA bhuvanam engum nirai mAyavan marugA
AraNapporuLE aDimai enai ALa vA vA vA rAmdAsan paNi guha
